attributes.action: All for an immediate General Election
attributes.additional_details: If Teresa May truly believes that she is carrying out the will of the British people, then she should have full confidence that the electorate will vote for her again.
attributes.background:
The Tory government and Theresa May promised, that if they were to be elected into power at the last election, they would deliver a full Brexit as voted for by the people.
It has become increasingly clear that the P M has  no intention of delivering on her promise, the people have had enough.
